Room.Name: Goblin Lair
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a small quiet passage in the goblin's lair.
Room.LongDescription: Ahead of you, the passage turns around a corner and disappears. You see a strange glow and hear a soft chanting in a forgein tongue coming from around the corner. To the east you can still hear the echoes of the screams coming from the pit you pasted.
